description: Detects the use of CleanWipe a tool usually used to delete Symantec antivirus.
name: CleanWipe Usage
query: (process.executable:*\\SepRemovalToolNative_x64.exe OR (process.executable:*\\CATClean.exe AND process.command_line:*\-\-uninstall*) OR (process.executable:*\\NetInstaller.exe AND process.command_line:*\-r*) OR (process.executable:*\\WFPUnins.exe AND process.command_line:*\/uninstall* AND process.command_line:*\/enterprise*))
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali @nas_bench
